Oct. 11, 1975 D Butlins National Youth Brass Band Championships
National Youth Brass Band Championships 10 Test Piece Contest National Youth Brass Band Championships of Great Britain national-youth-brass-band-championships
Count Down
Royal Albert Hall, Kensington, Kensington and Chelsea, Greater London, England, UK Bands had to play Count Down and March With a Beat. 10 bands competed.
